info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 07 at 9:15PM MDT until June 07 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL SAN MIGUEL...SOUTHERN HARDING AND CENTRAL QUAY COUNTIES... At 915 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Tucumcari, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Tucumcari, Logan and Ute Lake State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between Mile Markers 334 and 352. State Road 104 between Mile Markers 103 and 105. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
